projects.title: MMMUT CGPA Calculator
projects.desc: An interactive website made using HTML5, CSS, JS and Bootstrap to calculate the CGPA and SGPA of MMMUT B.Tech. students of MMMUT used by over  600+ people.

projects.title: Level 0 Portfolio
projects.desc: Created an interactive website from scratch using HTML5 and CSS to list all the projects developed as a beginner while learning any new technology The website lists 10+ projects as well as 30+ blogs on Web Development and Data Structure. Tech Used: HTML , CSS , JavaScript, Nodejs , Reactjs , jQuery

projects.title: Diary Web App
projects.desc: Created a web app using Nodejs and express for back-end in which a user can create, read, update and delete (CRUD) a blog. Designed the front end using technologies like Bootstrap, HTML, CSS and templating language EJS. Tech Used: HTML , CSS , Bootstrap , EJS , Nodejs , Express. (The project is in the development phase)

projects.title: Working on it
projects.desc: I am learning something new. If you have an idea or wanna build something together ping me. Let's build something great together.

exp.name: geeks
exp.des: Coordinated with the Technical Content Engineers team at GeeksforGeeks. Wrote 50+ and improved 30+ articles on Web Development, Data Structures and Algorithms

exp.name: chapter
exp.des: Coordinated with Codechef to start a coding club for our college to improve the programming and coding culture of the college, which helped 100+ juniors to start their coding journey. Established a community of 350+ members on Telegram and 175+ subscribers on YouTube

exp.name: ces
exp.des: As an Executive member of this society we organize different college level events related to computer science and engineering. We organize all this events under the two main events MATRIX and ENNEXUS

exp.name: hire
exp.des: I am team-oriented, hardworking individual willing to give my 100% for the organization and grow together with the organization. If you think I am a right fit for your organization I will be very happy to work in the organization.
